title: How to See Your Account Name in Steam

steps.title: Open your Steam client.
steps.content: Open your Steam client. You'll find Steam in your Windows Start menu or your Mac's Applications folder.

steps.title: Click your profile name in the upper-right corner.
steps.content: Click your profile name in the upper-right corner. It's next to the notification bell icon. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Account Details.
steps.content: Click Account Details . This will open a new window with all of your Steam account information. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Look for your Steam account name and ID at the top of the page.
steps.content: Look for your Steam account name and ID at the top of the page. Your account name will be listed at the very top (the page will be titled [Account name]'s Account). Your Steam ID number is listed directly below in small gray text. [3] X Research source You can also view your Steam ID in your profile settings. Simply click on your profile name, select View my profile and then Edit profile . Your Steam ID number will be listed below Custom URL after the text that says "Your profile will be available at:" followed by a URL. If you added a custom URL, delete the text in that box and the example URL will show your Steam ID.
